name: Hyatt Dulles

reviews.text: The Dulles Hyatt, in Herndon, is an excellent business-class hotel near Dulles Airport, ideal for overnight layovers at Dulles airport or for business travel along the Dulles Corridor.
reviews.title: Excellent business-class chain hotel near Dulles Airport; comfort, cleanliness, functionality.

reviews.text: Like most Hyatts, the hotel is modern, functional and very professionally run by all members of the staff. A free shuttle is provided to/from Dulles Int'l Airport, leaving frequently, starting early in the morning.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: Highlights included:
reviews.title: Good location, great staff, but internet ripoff fee

reviews.text: -Friendly open lobby bar, with good food. I really enjoyed sitting down to a friendly server, a nice cold beer, buffalo wings and NFL, after a missed flight connection.
reviews.title: Strict Lifeguards

reviews.text: -Excellent breakfast! Numerous options, including made-to-order or buffet, and very prefessional serving staff.
reviews.title: Quiet, very reasonable stay at nondescript location

reviews.text: I usually have pretty low expectations for hotels near airports. Most tend to be nondescript with customer service not being a strong point (in my experience). I was pleasantly surprised with my recent stay at the Hyatt near Dulles airport. My family and I stayed there for one night as part of a last-minute getaway to the D.C. area. Our first night was spent near Dulles so we could visit the new(ish) Air and Space Museum annex near Dulles (a don't-miss diversion, by the way). I've stayed in other airport Hyatts and this one was much nicer and the staff was simply amazing.
reviews.title: Location + staff + room made for a nice stay

reviews.text: Positives:
reviews.title: Expected more from Hyatt

reviews.text: > Very big and well-appointed room with two comfortable double beds, a separate sitting area with sofa and two chairs, and a desk and chair tucked away in a side part of the "living" room area. I believe this is the standard room layout; i.e., it wasn't a special suite or anything. One of the roomiest Hyatt setups I've been in (apart from a full two-room suite).
reviews.title: Great Staff

reviews.text: > You could easily use this room setup for an ad hoc airport meeting space for people flying in, or perhaps for interviews or the like. Lots of room, and intelligently laid out.
reviews.title: Nice hotel but the mattresses are substandard.

reviews.text: > All room amenities and furnishings were up to date and in good shape
reviews.title: Stayed one night- park and fly program- overall a good stay

reviews.text: Basic Hyatt property with convenient location near Dulles Airport. Pleasant pulblc spaces, professional and friendly staff. Rooms are large and well appointed but bathrooms are in need of serious updating and repair. A previous guest had spilled some type of soft drink on the desk and information binder and it had not been cleaned, but rather left to dry and leave a sticky mess. Basin drain was clogged and fixtures were broken. Not what one would expect from Hyatt. Breakfast buffet was very nice, but they charge $19.95 to eat! A bit outrageous in my opinion.
reviews.title: Business near Dulles

reviews.text: This Hyatt is next door to our corporate HQ, so it is a logical choice. There are however, several other good hotels nearby, but I always come back to the Hyatt. Maybe it is because they sometimes remember my name at reception, or because the shuttle drivers are so friendly, or every room is big and has a separate living area, or that the food is so good, or that we have had so many good times in the bar/lobby area??
reviews.title: It's Like Home Away From Home

reviews.text: if you are staying in this area of Herndon, I recommend it!
reviews.title: Good stay, some issues.

reviews.text: I've stayed at this Hyatt numerous times and each time was good. However, during one of my last stays, I did encounter a few issues.
reviews.title: Convenient, but lacking 5 star quality

reviews.text: When walking up to the building, I inquired about obtaining a bell cart. While the bellman pointed out the bell carts, the bellman did not offer to help me unload my car and bring my belongings up to my room.
reviews.title: Convenient Without DC Prices

reviews.text: Great hotel to look at - visually appealing. Friendly counter staff. Very good food and restaurant. So why the mediocre rating? Walls are too thin. I could almost participate on my neighbors conversation and heard everyone in the hall. You have to go to the front desk or self-serve kiosk for your receipt rather than having it delivered. I will not stay at this property again.
reviews.title: Showy with little substance

reviews.text: Only stayed for one night and there are small signs of aging in this property but the service is so good that that compensates for the slight aging. Also, the fitness facility is VERY nice -- good selection of machines, very well looked after..one of the best hotel facilities I have used.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT service

reviews.text: Nice rooms.Nice pool.Nice bar.Nice lobby.Nice location outside of DC.This hotel was a great stay for an extended vacation visiting Washington.We were more than impressed because it was better than the pictures and was located in an area that made driving in to all the tourist attractions of Virgina and Washington a breeze.Modern decor and clean and comfortable beds this hotel was well priced for all the amenities.Shuttles and a friendly and helpfull staff as well as free parking make this hotel well worth your stay.Its a buisness class hotel with clean and well landscaped grounds and family or work this hotel is for those who want a 4 star at a reasonable price.
reviews.title: Nothing Dull'es about this place

reviews.text: Bid through Priceline and very pleased with the hotel. Stayed 3 nights midweek on family vacation trip with teen. Free parking, spacious well designed rooms & bathroom/dressing room area with a coffeemaker (real milk would be appreciated rather than coffeemate). Hotel front desk staff is very pleasant and helpful. Very close to space museum (15 minute drive at most). Free internet use in business lounge in main lobby, complete with friendly, helpful staff.
reviews.title: Very comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Free shuttle bus to the airport every half hour (takes about 10 minutes) , then walk about 20 m to the platform for the bus to downtown DC ($6 each way, exact change required). Nice lap pool, hot tub and fitness equipment area -- not crowded, pleasant lifeguard.
reviews.title: Comfortable business-class hotel with good location

description: Full service deluxe property offering 316 newly renovated Executive Suites, featuring the Grand Bed. New state of the art Executive Meeting Center with a full service complimentary business center, catering to the business/"tech-savy" traveler. Our Executive Meeting Center is IACC accredited and LEED Certified. Expanded Fitness Center and Lap pool with strength training and cardio vascular equipment, all equipped with touch panel screens.
